title: Javascript Spring Break
blurb: Join us this month for a nice dose of functional JS.

speakers.title: Manipulating data structures with JavaScript data type's methods
speakers.name: Sebastien Filion
speakers.synopsis: Using JavaScripts data type's methods is a flexible way of manipulating data structures; Discover functional programing and how to make the most out these expressive techniques. After this talk you will be able to solve everyday problems elegantly.
